posts.post_title: 19th c. R&S die cut New York
posts.post_content:
$50.00 delivered. Check or money order only. New York residents must add sales tax. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations, requests for information, etc. Correspondence by email at [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Please visit my updated website. Thank you for looking.

Please let me know if you can view it. [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] Thanks to everyone for their patience.
